last_episode_to_air.name: Soul Mates
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the day of her wedding Sabrina is still trying to find whether her groom or Harvey is her real soul-mate.

name: Sabrina, the Teenage Witch
overview: On her sixteenth birthday, Sabrina Spellman discovers she has magical powers. She lives with her 600-year-old aunts Hilda and Zelda as well as talking cat Salem in the fictional town of Westbridge, Massachusetts.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: On her 16th birthday, Sabrina Spellman discovers she’s half-witch, half-mortal. Living with her aunts Hilda and Zelda, and their talking cat Salem, she begins mastering her magical powers while navigating high school life and her budding romance with Harvey Kinkle.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Sabrina’s magical abilities are put to the test as she trains under a Quiz Master to earn her witch’s license. Balancing spells, school, and teenage challenges, she learns that with great power comes great responsibility.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: To finalize her witch’s license, Sabrina must uncover a deep family secret. Her quest leads to unexpected revelations, all while she continues to juggle the complexities of teenage life and magic.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: In her final year of high school, Sabrina mentors a young witch named Dreama and faces challenges from a new student, Brad, who unknowingly possesses witch-hunting abilities. Romantic entanglements intensify as she finds herself torn between Harvey and a new love interest, Josh.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Embarking on college life in Boston, Sabrina moves in with roommates Roxie, Morgan, and Miles. She navigates new academic pressures, friendships, and romantic relationships, all while keeping her magical identity under wraps.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Sabrina continues her college journey, now working at a city newspaper alongside her boyfriend, Josh. She faces challenges in balancing her professional aspirations, personal relationships, and magical responsibilities.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Transitioning into adulthood, Sabrina takes a job at Scorch Magazine and becomes engaged to Aaron Jacobs. As she plans her wedding, she reflects on her past with Harvey, leading to pivotal decisions about love and her future.
